comments: This class really made me look forward to teaching.

Class was easy-going, low-pressure, and relaxing. Almost felt more like we were hanging out than having class. He is very inspiring and has interesting opinions on teaching. If you can get his class--take it. You\'ll get an A if you show up and participate in discussions.
WHY CAN\'T ALL PROFESSORS BE LIKE MIKE LOVORN???

Really REALLY the nicest professor I have ever met. Gave me extra time to do assignments because said my "best work" is more important than deadlines. Doesnt believe in grading AT ALL so guaranteed A if you come to class and can talk.
Awesome professor. Learned a lot from an easy-going, funny guy. Don\'t worry about your grade--as long as he sees you putting forth effort you\'ll be fine. One of the best professors I\'ve ever had.

Dr. Lovorn is a really laid back guy who cares about the subject matter. I really learned some things I\'ll be able to use in the classroom. I encourage anyone at UA who is in Social Scince Ed to take Dr. Lovorn.
